resources.string:
This extension is useful in the following situations: 
 1. The extension provides Jieshuo, VoiceBack, and Prudence with access to Samsung Internet 
 2. This extension allows faster typing on the Samsung keyboard 
 Note that not all keyboards may be supported; you may need to enable double-tap typing in your screen reader settings 

 Created by Smit TV 
 https://github.com/Smit-TV
Activate keys with a single tap
Donâ€™t forget to enable double-tap key activation in your screen reader
Disable gestures when the keyboard is shown
Gestures in the keyboard area will be disabled. \n Note that double-tap will not work in the keyboard area. \n This feature may not work with TalkBack.
Long press works when holding down keys. \n Use 0 to disable this feature
Thanks to everyone who made a donation! \n Tap "Continue" to go to the donation page
After creating the debug file, you need to send it to the developer, this can be done using Telegram
